title: THE STUDY OF SERUM PROTEINS AND LIPIDS WITH THE AID OF THE QUANTITY ULTRACENTRIFUGE. I. PROCEDURE AND PRINCIPAL FEATURES OF THE CENTRIFUGATE OF UNTREATED NORMAL SERUM AS DETERMINED BY QUANTITATIVE ANALYSIS OF SAMPLES FROM TEN LEVELS
author: The Journal; Roy H Turner; John Robert Snavely; William H Goldwater; Malcolm L Randolph; Charles C Sprague; Walter G Unglaub
